evidence: "The objective of the **castor** library is to propose **high-level semantics**, inspired by the Matlab language, allowing fast software prototyping in a low-level compiled language. It is nothing more than a matrix management layer using the tools of the **standard C++ library**" (indicates a C++ library intended to be used by other code, i.e., dependency).

"It is nothing more than a matrix management layer... in different storage formats (full, sparse and hierarchical)." (matrix management for numerical computing, directly used in scientific/technical computations).

Project hosted under an organization account "leprojetcastor" with documentation at a lab-associated URL "gitlab.labos.polytechnique.fr" (suggests a lab/research group as primary maintainer rather than an individual or company).
